content: Customer John Smith is from Barcelona, Spain. He joined on October 11, 2022, and has made a total of 10 orders with an average order value of $402. His recent purchase was the Logitech g402 Gaming mouse. Based on his order history, John is interested in gaming accessories and electronics. He has purchased items such as gaming mice, keyboards, headsets, speakers, and a laptop. John has spent a total of $4020 on his orders. He does not accept marketing. Overall, John Smith is a tech-savvy customer from Barcelona who is interested in gaming accessories and electronics.
